# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-102">Adicionando bandeiras e lembretes em Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-103">Para definir ou editar um lembrete para um evento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-104">Ir ao [Calendário.](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-105">Selecione o evento de que deseja ser lembrado e, em seguida, selecione as setas no canto superior direito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-106">para expandi-lo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-107">Ao lado **de me lembrar,** escolha um tempo de lembrete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-108">Outlook.com automaticamente salva as suas alterações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-109">Para se lembrar de acompanhar uma mensagem, pode adicionar uma bandeira de acompanhamento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-110">Ir para o [Correio](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-111">Na lista de mensagens, paire sobre a mensagem para ver a opção de bandeira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-112">Selecione o ícone da bandeira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-113">para sinalizar a mensagem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-114">Para ver todas as suas mensagens sinalizadas, selecione a marca de verificação no canto inferior esquerdo da página para ir a Tasks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="f1ad8-115">Para saber mais, leia [Bandeira ou pin uma mensagem em Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f1ad8-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
